name: Brinley Recycled Clutch
description:
A beautifully unique clutch bag made from recycled fabrics - The Amari Collection.

These cheerful one off bags are carefully re-cut, designed and handmade from upcycled sample books.

This lovely collection from NIKI P is perfect for brightening up any outfit for a number of occasions. Each clutch features it’s own gorgeous bow made from complimenting fabric, ideal for that unusual gift.

Large enough to keep all the essentials and has a secure easy close magnetic clasp.

All accessories have been carefully sourced, designed and made in England.

Fabric design variations available but will never be repeated and only available while stocks last.

made from:
Quality Linen and Cotton weave.

dimensions:
Once closed measures approximately H17 x W31cm

*Free Shipping on UK orders*

name: Scarlet Recycled Clutch
description:
A vibrant clutch bag made from gorgeous recycled fabrics - The ROMO Menotti Collection.

Undoubtedly making a special gift, these stunning one off clutch bags have been carefully recut and handmade from recycled upholstery sample books.

Perfect for the fashion savvy who is aware of throw away fashion and looking for something to keep and use again and again whilst happily knowing that no one else has the same bag!

Large enough to keep all the essentials and has a secure easy close magnetic clasp.

All accessories have been carefully sourced, designed and made in England.

the same

name: Cypress 18.01
description:
A gorgeous handmade bag made from totally stunning recycled fabrics,the Sacho Bloom Collection.

With all that we throw away everyday, it feels great to be re-using and creating these beautiful bags which are made from recycled, designer fabric books.

Each one has been carefully re-cut into fabulous, unique accessories. No two are the same and consist of several complimenting samples which sit beautifully alongside each other.

Ideal for everyday use or saved for special occasions, there’s no doubt this little clutch will certainly turn some heads and makes a special gift. Complete with a long over the shoulder antique style chain which can be wrapped around for a shorter look or even tucked inside to show off as a clutch.

Each bag has it’s own name taken from the sample and collection it was cut from and has been sprayed with waterproof sealant to prevent wear and tear.

All accessories have been carefully sourced, designed and made in England.

Fabric design variations available but will never be repeated and only available while stocks last.

Made from:
The finest quality recycled silks and weaves.

Spot clean only.

Dimensions:
H20 x W22 x D5cm

Free shipping on UK orders.

name: Bloom Clutch
description:
This stunning digitally printed pure Silk and Velvet clutch bag is top choice for a night out or special occasion. The 'Brocade Burgeon' inspired design takes carefully hand drawn illustrations which are then transformed into beautiful prints, emphasising the level of love and care in it's creation that cannot be found on the high street. 

Complete with a handcrafted leather wrap around strap with secure brass magnet fastening and a leather carry handle. Includes a small inner pocket for essentials and finished with a NIKI P label.

Designed, printed and handmade in the UK.

Dimensions; 30 x 20 x 6cm 

Made from 100% Silk, pure Velvet, quality Lambskin Leather and brass hardware. 

Placement of prints may vary slightly, any differences are simply each products' unique character.

Free shipping on UK orders.

name: Large Bloom Framed Clutch
description:
This fabulous printed oversized snap clutch makes the perfect evening bag or even great to brighten up a more casual look. It will certainly take centre stage at your next special occasion, with its stylish silver style frame and luxurious printed pure silk body. 

The 'Brocade Burgeon' inspired design takes carefully hand drawn illustrations which are then transformed into beautiful prints. This emphases the level of love and care in it's creation that cannot be found on the high street, making a truly unique gift.

Large enough to hold all the essentials. Complete with a special polkadot lining and finished with a NIKI P label.

Designed, printed and handmade in the UK.

Dimensions: Width at top 27cm/Width at bottom 36cm/Height 24cm

Made from 100% silk, quality cotton lining, silver style hardware.

Care: Spot clean only with a damp cloth.

Placement of prints may vary slightly, any differences are simply each products' unique character.

Free shipping on UK orders.

name: Brocade Bloom Silk Scarf
description:
Beautiful printed pure silk scarf contrasts hand illustrated pen-and-ink botanical studies with strong graphical motifs reminiscent of Edwardian crochet and structured lace. These drawings, influenced by Ferdinand Bauer's 'Illustrationes Florae,' have a straight from the sketchbook quality that is retained during their transformation into print. Using both traditional and modern techniques gives the designs a contemporary feel but also emphasises the level of love and care in their creation that cannot be found on the high street. 

Each unique silk scarf comes with its very own branded gift box.

All NIKI P's accessories are designed, printed and hand made in the UK.

100% Silk - Take care of me, wash by hand in cool water. 

Long Silk Scarf - 150x25cm

Photography - Marcin Prasal - www.marcinprasal.com

Free shipping on UK orders.
